other_title: 映画プリキュアドリームスターズ！ (Japanese)
plot: A mysterious girl named Sakura appears before Cure Whip. Sakura comes from another world, where one day the evil Karasutengu crow-billed goblin, bent on stealing the world's pretty things, emerges and kidnaps her friend, a fox named Shizuku. Sakura seeks out the Precure for their help.
opening_theme: "Sakura MISSION ~PreCure Relation~" (桜MISSION～プリキュアリレーション～) by Rie Kitagawa, Yuka Uchiyae & Mayumi Gojo
ending_theme: "Kimi o Yobu Basho" (Place Where I Call You) by Yoshino Kimura
